attributes.additional_details:
Jagtar has been accused of running a magazine that discusses the 1984 Sikh genocide in the Punjab and influencing the youth through social media.

It has been acknowledged that he is being tortured by the Indian police. 

We need the British government to step in and bring Jagtar back to the UK.
attributes.background:
Jagtar Singh Johal, travelled to India to get married on the 2nd of October. He was out shopping with his new wife & his cousin in Jalandhar, Punjab when he was accosted by plain clothed police officers who threw a sack over his head and took him away. 
Jagtar has been accused of influencing youth
